runs.comm: tossed up and goes straight, the batsman comes forward and defends
first runs, he comes forward and dabs the fuller delivery to midwicket for a single
tossed up delivery on off, the batsman comes forward and defends to cover
good bit of flight from Badree, but even better shot from Anamul.. He moves to the leg side and drives this inside out through extra cover
this one is just over mid-off! The batsman plays an inside out drive again, but Russell leaps with perfect timing, but just can't hold on.. Brilliant effort
flatter delivery, the batsman punches it back to the bowler
fires this full on the pads as Tamim looks to come out.. the batsman misses his flick and gets hit on the pads
he bowls a good slower ball wide outside off. Tamim looks to drive it too hard but makes no contact
excellent shot! He takes a step down the pitch, makes it a half-volley and creams it over point with a sliced shot
length delivery outside off, the batsman cuts it to backward point
good slower ball this from Santokie. It's on a length and the batsman comes forward to defend
slower and wider outside off, the batsman looks to punch it but finds the man at cover point
bowls a skiddy delivery outside off, Anamul stays back and punches it to long on

an appeal for lbw as Tamim looks to hit the full delivery across the line! The umpire says 'he has hit it' but I didn't see anything.. then there is a chance of run out as Anamul as come too far down.. Both survive

he has thrown it away! Another early strike for Badree as the batsman drives this firmly to mid-off where Bravo takes a good low catch diving to his left. Tamim got a lot of timing on that, but no elevation
full and on the block hole, the batsman pushes it to cover where Sammy makes a good save, lobs it to the bowler, who is no there.. they take an overthrow...
bowls a flat skidder on the stumps, the batsman goes back and whacks it to wide long on for a single
that was the googly! tossed up and turns away from the left hander to beat his intended cut shot.. nicely bowled

this is wonderful work by Ramdin! Super quick hands from the keeper as he whips the bails in no time.. The batsman came forward to push, missed the ball going across him.. By the time he realised anything, the bails had been taken off with his back foot in the air

it gets worse for Bangladesh! Absolutely brilliantly disguised stunning delivery! Another slower one outside off, another one that cuts a bit after pitching.. The batsman looks to push it to off, but leaves a gap between the bat and pad and sees flashing lights behind him
another slower ball! This one, if one has to nitpick, just a touch shorter and the batsman defends it comfortably off the back foot
pushes this one wide outside off, a quicker one.. that's well kept by the keeper, but that is a wide
another slower delivery on off, the batsman pushes it to mid off
length delivery at normal pace outside off, the batsman steers it down to third man for a single
slower and fuller outside off, the batsman pushes it to wide mid off for a quick single
he bowls this slower outside off, the batsman looks to cut it through backward point, but can't find the gap
fuller delivery down the leg side, the batsman gets some pad on that
bowls it slow, the batsman goes back and whips it to deep midwicket for a single
tossed up delivery, Mushy plays a premeditated paddle, but plays it too early. He is lucky to get some bat on that though, otherwise it was heading for stumps
an appeal for lbw as this one turns into the batsman, but there was a big inside edge on that
flatter and quicker, the batsman pushes it straight to point. That's another excellent over from West INdies
slower and tossed up on off, the batsman dabs it to cover for a single
tossed up outside off, the batsman looks to hit across the line towards wide long on, but hits it just over the short midwicket fielder.. These fielders are tall.. Mushy needs to be careful
he goes deep into the crease, allows the ball to turn, then punches it to deep cover
that was close to the leg stump! Rahim moves across to the off side to play a paddle, but misses
now that's one is off the middle! He sits on his knee and sends this soaring over midwicket with a powerful slog sweep. It goes deep into the stands
good amount of bounce on this! The batsman takes his bottom hand off the handle as he gets surprised by that
back of length delivery outside off, the batsman plays a good cut shot but Smith dives at point to cut it off
length delivery on the stumps, keeps it slow.. the batsman pushes it to cover
takes the pace off as he bowls this on the stumps, the batsman whips it to deep midwicket for a single
beautiful slower delivery! The batsman misses as he goes back to play a late cut.. that was not far off from the off stump
nicely controls this one! Waits an extra moment for this short of length delivery, then cracks it in the gap at backward point
another leg cutter on the stumps, the batsman waits and clips it to deep midwicket for a single
first ball is the one that turns away! Bounces extra too and surprises the batsman as he dabs it to the leg side for a single
quicker delivery on off, the batsman looks to push it to the off side, but gets cramped for room
slower and tossed up on the middle stump, the batsman flicks it to deep square leg
goes deep in the crease and dabs it towards midwicket with soft hands for a single
pitched outside leg, the batsman looks to paddle this fine, but gets hit on the pads.. he picks up a leg bye
he stays back in the crease, waits for the ball to do it's trick, then punches it to long on for a single
slower delivery wide outside off, 107 kph, the batsman has to wait before punching it to deep cover
comes down the pitch and gets a thick top edge over the keeper's head! Even Sammy won't be able to get that if he was keeping.. Maybe he would have got it..Welcome boundary
bowls it quick but bowls it down the wrong line, it's a wide down the leg side
comes down the pitch and looks to hoick this across the line, but misses.. The ball misses the off stump by a whisker
this is smartly done! He moves way across to the off side and ramps up the the slower delivery over his shoulder for a boundary..
now Samuels drops it! This was a thick top edge headed straight for third man.. Samuels ambles in and looks set to take it, but fluffs an easy one.. Infectious
length delivery wide outside off, chopped straight to point

top-edge! Santokie can't do anything wrong and Narine is among wickets already. With the pressure of the required rate, Mominul goes for a sweep without getting closer to the pitch of the delivery and we have seen there is good bounce on this wicket. he gets a big top edge that is taken by the fielder at short fine leg easily
he looks to play a late cut on this straighter one.. misses it
this time he succeeds! He waits till the last moment, then opens the face to beat the short third man fielder comfortably. Some extra width compared to the last ball
it's the other one, the batsman waits on the back foot and punches it to long on for a single
whoa!! This one is awesome delivery.. pitched on leg, misses top of off.. Extra bounce saves the batsman.. Warne would have been proud
waits on the back foot and dabs the flatter delivery towards midwicket

another one goes down! Sabbir reads the googly alright but he pulls it straight to Sammy at midwicket... the fielder takes the catch and drops the ball down immediately as he has hurt his finger.. But I think he held it for enough time for this to be counted..
he waits on the back foot and dabs it to point for a single

un-be-li-evable! Another one for Badree. The captain has to go. It was short , it was wide and it's the catch of the day at point by Bravo.. Mushy got a fair bit of bat on that, but Bravo flies to his right and pulls this inches off the ground.. Super one-hander this one..
lots of air on this one, the batsman takes it on the full and drives it down to long off
skidder on the middle stump from Badree, defended back down the pitch
make it four for Badree! This is a soft one.. The batsman looks to cut and gets a faint edge to the keeper..Extra bounce does the job. These are his best figures in T20s now
tossed up and full, driven down the ground for a couple as the long on fielder is wide
this one turns the other way and beats the outside edge as the batsman looks to defend
whoo, another wrong'un.. the batsman doesn't have a clue.. beaten again
and another one, this time he gets some bat and takes a single to cover
another wrong-un, another one beats the outside edge
and another carrom ball, this takes the outside edge to deep point for a single
bowls this one down the leg side, called a wide
slower delivery outside off, the batsman slices it to backward point
this one is a proper pace full delivery, it swings into the right-hander.. just that it swings too much
fuller delivery outside off, the batsman drives it to deep cover
fuller and normal-pace delivery, some swing for the bowler too.. Pushed back down the pitch
slower cutter, pitches and moves away from the right-hander, beats the bat easily
he looks up as he drags the slower delivery to the leg side, but there is no top-edge.. hits it to deep midwicket off the inside half
slower delivery outside off, the batsman pushes it to long off for a single
bowls this quick outside off, the batsman throws his bat at it but is beaten by the bounce
comes out of the crease and punches the back of length delivery to deep cover
makes room by moving away to the leg side and gets a top edge to third man off a shortish delivery
slower delivery outside off, Gazi dabs it down to third man for a single
another slower delivery, the batsman makes room and chops it straight to point
length delivery on off stump, it's steered down to third man for a single
fuller outside off, the batsman drives it to deep extra cover to pick up a rare two
slower delivery, attempted mow across the line, the death rattle is heard - not from the broken stumps - but from the numb crowd.
length delivery on the pads, it's flicked to deep midwicket for a single
quick short delivery, the batsman awkwardly defends it to leg side
another slower delivery on off, it goes right through the batsman, misses the off stump
bowls a carrom ball, beats the outside edge. How many times have we already seen this today!
fuller on the stumps, it is pushed back to the bowler
fuller delivery outside off, it's dabbed to point for a single
big offspinner that is tucked behind square on the leg side for a single
flatter and shorter outside off, crunched too deep point for a single
beautiful legspinner! good amount of turn and completely bamboozles the batsman as it beats his flick.. that missed the outside edge
he starts off with a yorker on off stump, dug out to the off side
fuller delivery, driven down to long on for a single
a good slower ball! the batsman looks to swing across the line and misses, that slides past the leg stump
length delivery on off stump, it is punched down to long on for a single
takes his eyes off as he pulls this back of the length deilvery, he is pleasantly surprised as he sees this disappear at deep backward square leg
looks to repeat the shot, but make a limp contact this time.. back down the pitch
slower delivery, the batsman swings across the line, he gets a big top edge, but that lands safely behind the umpire..Mid off could have made it in time if he had shown intent
slower delivery, another thick edge, this one is fine on the off side and runs down to the boundary
another slower delivery outside off, the batsman is beaten as he looks to play a cute little cut
fuller delivery on leg stump, thumped down to long off for a single
moves to the leg side and flat-bats the shortish delivery to long on for a single
fires in a yorker that is flicked to deep midwicket for a single
slower delivery on the stumps, he is beaten by the pace as he looks to flog that to leg side, but gets a faint outside edge that runs down to the boundary
drop no. 2 by Samuels! Top-edge, Samuels at fine leg has all the time.. Still fluffs it
fuller delivery outside off, it's driven to deep cover

slower delivery, this one is off the middle, heads down to long on where Bravo, nonchalantly takes his close to his boots.. throws it back at the stumps and goes back to his fielding position.. Super catch that one..
slower delivery on off, the batsman gets off the mark with a dab to point
game over! Full and on off, that beats the bat and hits the off stump..
